QuestData.Title: A Strange Weapon
QuestData.Description: You pull the stone axe out of the body to examine it more closely. There's something unusual about the craftsmanship of the weapon.$B$BIts origin appears orcish, though the materials aren't like anything you've seen before. Nazgrel might be interested in seeing the weapon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Heavy Stone Axe to Nazgrel in Thrallmar in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.CompletionText: Tell me, is the assassin dead?
QuestData.RewardText: He was killed by this weapon? It can't be!$B$BHave we... found them?
